name: Beautiful Doom
description:
Score points destroying power crystals on a space station defended by biomechanical animals. Made on Train Jam 2019.

Controls (Keyboard):

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Click - Shot
  • Wait + Left Click - Boom Shot
  • Space or Right Click - Jump

Credits:

  • Raphael Azcueta (@LUNARSIGNALS) - Code
  • James Palermo (@JamesisAsian) - Art
  • Elie Abraham (@ElieAbraham64) - Music
  • Shane Yach (@tipsheda) - Stretchyboy Prime

A Stretchy Boys Collective title.
